class.name: de.donmanfred.Configuratorwrapper
class.event: onPageChanged(oldPage As Int, newPage As Int)
onLayerDrawn(cnvs As Canvas, arg1 As Float, arg2 As Float, arg3 As Int)
onPageScrolled(arg0 As Int, arg1 As Float)

method.name: getPageCount
method.comment: Get total numer of pages in document

method.name: renderPageBitmap
method.comment:
Render page fragment on {@link Bitmap}. Page must be opened before rendering.
Supported bitmap configurations:
ARGB_8888 - best quality, high memory usage, higher possibility of OutOfMemoryError RGB_565 - little worse quality, twice less memory usage

method.name: closeDocument
method.comment: Release native resources and opened file

method.name: openPage
method.comment: Open page and store native pointer in {@link PdfDocument}

method.name: getPageHeight
method.comment:
Get page height in pixels.
This method requires page to be opened.

method.name: getPageWidthPoint
method.comment:
Get page width in PostScript points (1/72th of an inch).
This method requires page to be opened.

method.name: newDocument2
method.comment: Create new document from bytearray

method.name: newDocument3
method.comment: Create new document from bytearray with password

method.name: getPageWidth
method.comment:
Get page width in pixels.
This method requires page to be opened.

method.name: getPageHeightPoint
method.comment:
Get page height in PostScript points (1/72th of an inch).
This method requires page to be opened.

method.name: mapRectToDevice
method.comment: Return type: @return:mapped coordinates

method.name: getDocumentMeta
method.comment: Get metadata for given document

method.name: renderPage2
method.comment: Render page fragment on {@link Surface}. This method allows to render annotations. Page must be opened before rendering.

method.name: getTableOfContents
method.comment: Get table of contents (bookmarks) for given document

method.name: renderPage
method.comment: Render page fragment on {@link Surface}. Page must be opened before rendering.

method.name: renderPageBitmap2
method.comment:
Render page fragment on {@link Bitmap}. This method allows to render annotations.
Page must be opened before rendering.

For more info see {@link PdfiumCore#renderPageBitmap(PdfDocument, Bitmap, int, int, int, int, int)}

method.name: getPageSize
method.comment:
Get size of page in pixels.
This method does not require given page to be opened.

method.name: mapPageCoordsToDevice
method.comment: Map page coordinates to device screen coordinates doc: pdf document pageIndex: index of page startX: left pixel position of the display area in device coordinates startY: top pixel position of the display area in device coordinates sizeX: horizontal size (in pixels) for displaying the page sizeY: vertical size (in pixels) for displaying the page rotate: page orientation: 0 (normal), 1 (rotated 90 degrees clockwise), 2 (rotated 180 degrees), 3 (rotated 90 degrees counter-clockwise) pageX: X value in page coordinates pageY: Y value in page coordinate Return type: @return:mapped coordinates

method.name: getPageLinks
method.comment: Get all links from given page

method.name: zoomCenteredTo
method.comment: Change the zoom level, relatively to a pivot point. It will call moveTo() to make sure the given point stays in the middle of the screen. zoom: The zoom level. pivot: The point on the screen that should stays.

method.name: loadPages
method.comment: Load all the parts around the center of the screen, taking into account X and Y offsets, zoom level, and the current page displayed

method.name: fromFile
method.comment: Use a file as the pdf source path: filename:

method.name: moveRelativeTo
method.comment: Move relatively to the current position. dx: The X difference you want to apply. dy: The Y difference you want to apply.

method.name: moveTo2
method.comment: Move to the given X and Y offsets, but check them ahead of time to be sure not to go outside the the big strip. offsetX: The big strip X offset to use as the left border of the screen. offsetY: The big strip Y offset to use as the right border of the screen. moveHandle: whether to move scroll handle or not

method.name: jumpTo2
method.comment: Go to the given page. page: Page index.

method.name: onBitmapRendered
method.comment: Called when a rendering task is over and a PagePart has been freshly created. part: The created PagePart.

method.name: fromSource
method.comment: Use custom source as pdf source

method.name: getLinks
method.comment: Will be empty until document is loaded

method.name: getPageAtPositionOffset
method.comment: Get page number at given offset positionOffset: scroll offset between 0 and 1 Return type: @return:page number at given offset, starting from 0

method.name: fromAsset
method.comment: Use an asset file as the pdf source

method.name: performPageSnap
method.comment: Animate to the nearest snapping position for the current SnapPolicy

method.name: zoomTo
method.comment: Change the zoom level

method.name: fromBytes
method.comment: Use bytearray as the pdf source, documents is not saved

method.name: setPositionOffset2
method.comment: progress: must be between 0 and 1 moveHandle: whether to move scroll handle

method.name: fromStream
method.comment: Use stream as the pdf source. Stream will be written to bytearray, because native code does not support Java Streams

method.name: fromUri
method.comment: Use URI as the pdf source, for use with content providers

property.name: PositionOffset
property.comment: Get current position as ratio of document length to visible area. 0 means that document start is visible, 1 that document end is visible

property.name: TableOfContents
property.comment: Will be empty until document is loaded

property.name: DocumentMeta
property.comment: Returns null if document is not loaded

property.name: documentFitsView
property.comment: Checks if whole document can be displayed on screen, doesn't include zoom
